channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti, 5th July
item.description:
Graffiti has not been removed and is consequently being added to.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bycroft Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering in Shacklewell Row, 5th July
item.description:
Hello It’s Shacklewell primary summer fair today and there’s loads of littler and dog poo on Shacklewell Row. Is there any chance a cleaning team could go there today? Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shacklewell Row, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Branch has torn off Willow tree, 5th July
item.description:
A large Branch has torn down from a Willow tree into the pond . It is on the pond side where the path runs in the Dog area. I know nothing can be done at the moment as it is nesting season so removal cant be done until later on this year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti at the back alley of Arthur Grove, 5th July
item.description:
Outside number 7 Arthur Grove at the back down the alley by his back gate is graffiti probably from the tenant at number seven as he has done it inside the garden walls as well. It’s unsightly and needs to be removed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burrage Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish been dumped at post box at end of Edwards road, 5th July
item.description:
Continuing problem of people dumping rubbish here. More rubbish here again. Rats and foxes seen due to this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paroma Road, Lower Belvedere, London

item.title: The pathways behind the garages in Wellington avanue are over grown and need cutting, 5th July
item.description:
Someone has dumped cut trees and bushes behind the garage and the grass and shrubbery is overgrown and needs cuttings. Behind the garages from 34-39 Wellington avanue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Wellington Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing pigeon/flea infestation at the beckers rectory road, 5th July
item.description:
I am writing to raise a concern regarding a persistent [pigeon/flea] issue affecting my home at flat 75 the beckersThe problem appears to be caused by flat 79 property, external infestation, pigeons nesting on balconies
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rectory Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish by / in Football Pitch, 5th July
item.description:
The mere is a constant presence of rubbish, littering and dumped Lime bikes by th Kieth Miller Football pitch. the people isi g the pitch constantly dump rubbish and litter with no care or concern of the facility or the community. It’s disgusting and rude.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge Flytip at top of Stembridge road, 5th July
item.description:
3rd report. There is a huge Flytip at the top of Stembridge road. I have reported this already, twice. Can this be cleared asap as people are just dumping more and more rubbish on top .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stembridge Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flying tipping green chain walk, 5th July
item.description:
Rubbish bags have been dumped on the green chain walk as you walk into the woods. Bags have been opened by animals and scattered across the path, they have been ripped open and are ommitting a foul odour. There are also black bags of waste in the grass on the side of the path. The emergency fire gate just past the cemetery entrance is also open so this is continously happening. I have previously rung about it and was given the reference 00E1001716.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cemetery Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass and litter at playground, 5th July
item.description:
Broken glass at playground!! Very serious risk for harm

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Groombridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Bins opposite Trinity Hospital (Thames Path) overflowing, 5th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glaisher Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet
